job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-architecturen gebaseerd op large language models (LLMs) zoals GPT en andere geavanceerde AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the design and implementation of AI architectures, specifically mentioning LLMs and advanced AI models, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van schaalbare AI-oplossingen en het ontwerpen van flexibele, toekomstbestendige architecturen voor cloudomgevingen zoals Azure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes building scalable AI solutions and designing architectures for cloud environments, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwikkelen en beheren van AI-modellen, van proof-of-concept tot productie, waarbij je zorgt voor naadloze integratie en deployment op cloudplatforms
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end management of AI models, from development to production and deployment, which aligns with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Het toepassen van vaardigheden in prompt engineering om LLMs te optimaliseren en aan te passen aan specifieke klantbehoeften en use-cases
job_tasks.justification: Prompt engineering and optimizing LLMs are direct modeling tasks within the GenAI domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Het combineren van GenAI-kennis met traditionele machine learning-technieken en frameworks zoals Python , TensorFlow , en PyTorch om hybride AI-oplossingen te realiseren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions combining GenAI with traditional ML techniques and specific ML frameworks, indicating modeling activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen en beheren van API's voor AI-diensten, inclusief API-management en beveiliging.
job_tasks.justification: Building and managing APIs for AI services is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer needs and translating them into solutions, which is a key aspect of business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), prompt engineering, and building AI solutions using GenAI techniques. It also includes core responsibilities like developing and managing AI models from concept to production and building APIs for AI services, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
